episodesJson.title: Somefarwhere
episodesJson.description: Everyone, this week's episode was tough on all of us. This movie doesn't make a bit of sense, and Eric may never forgive us for making him watch it. We watched the 2011 movie Somefarwhere, about a guy who goes to an unnamed Middle Eastern country to rescue his army boyfriend, and along the way gets tangled up in a plot not even the writer/director understands. Come along with us on this journey, but don't expect to understand it any better than we do.
topics: Trying to intimidate someone in a room equipped with a clapper
No Shirt, No Shoes, No Service
Everyone go watch the movie Society
